Lyric:
[by:臧蔵藏贜欌臟]
[ti:最终信仰]
[ar:尚雯婕]
[al:]
[00:06.50]
[00:07.62]在前方 有微光 黑夜发亮 
[00:14.28]一颗心 越疼痛 越发烫 越强壮 
[00:20.29]曾去的地方 再次前往
[00:25.04]我带着伤 也带着希望 
[00:33.16]回归承诺 
[00:35.88]Never lose your heart 
[00:37.97]Never lose your faith 
[00:39.74]Never lose your way 
[00:43.43]Hold on to your love 
[00:45.35]Hold on to your dream 
[00:47.17]Count all your blessings 
[00:51.38]
[00:52.76]悬崖上的花 越芬芳越无常 
[00:56.54]You hold all the cards You hold all the cards 
[01:03.08]
[01:07.81]就像是 黑色海洋 一座沉默 灯塔 
[01:14.28]多渴望 才凝望 指引着 我方向 
[01:20.37]拍打岩石的浪 温柔勇敢的力量 
[01:26.67]I close my eyes 在云中 我在云中 
[01:35.95]Never lose your heart 
[01:37.95]Never lose your faith 
[01:39.76]Never lose your way 
[01:43.53]Hold on to your love 
[01:45.39]Hold on to your dream 
[01:47.23]Count all your blessings 
[01:51.22]
[01:52.79]悬崖上的花 越芬芳越无常 
[01:56.52]You hold all the cards You hold all the cards 
[02:02.64]
[02:04.56]Hum along hum along 
[02:08.32]我不害怕 因为有你在等着我
[02:13.56]一起回家 你一直在那里 
[02:22.71]Let’s get back to the world 
[02:24.77]Let’s get back to the world 
[02:28.19]
[02:34.01]我流浪 我吟唱 前世的故乡 
[02:40.53]无所谓 路多长 时空苍苍 人海茫茫 
[02:47.23]你的眼光 我的方向 谁和我一样 
[02:54.72]最虔诚的眺望 最后信仰 
[03:02.21]Never lose your heart 
[03:04.21]Never lose your faith 
[03:06.00]Never lose your way 
[03:09.83]Hold on to your love 
[03:11.59]Hold on to your dream 
[03:13.48]Count all your blessings 
[03:17.61]
[03:19.05]悬崖上的花 越芬芳越无常 
[03:22.77]You hold all the cards You hold all the cards 
[03:28.67]
[03:30.82]Hum along hum along 
[03:34.57]我不害怕因为有你在等着我
[03:39.73]一起回家 你一直在那里 
[03:49.07]Let’s get back to the world 
[03:50.84]Let’s get back to the world
[04:00.60]
